metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000115 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Mercurial prior to version 4.3 is vulnerable to a missing symlink check that can malicious repositories to modify files outside the repository It was discovered that Mercurial incorrectly handled symlinks. An attacker could possibly use this issue to insert, edit or obtain sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
mercurial-common - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1').
